p: Dried BSFL used in this study was obtained from a local BSFL producer, BiomaggÂ® (Depok, Indonesia). The BSFL was fed with residual mixture, vegetable, and bread crumbs. N-hexane was obtained from PT Brataco (Indonesia), bromelain enzyme powder was obtained from PT Bromelain Enzim Indonesia, O-pthyaldyaldehyde was obtained from Sigma Aldrich (Singapore), HCl, NaOH, Na 2HPO 4, KH 2PO 4, Commassie Blue - R, 96% ethanol, distill water, Dithiotheritol (DTT) 99%, and sodium dodecyl sulfate (SDS) were obtained from the chemicals warehouse of School of Life Science and Technology ITB (Bandung, Indonesia).
